name: ASTER Long-Only Grid Strategy (15m Data)
description: Long-only grid trading strategy for ASTER using 15-minute timeframe data. Places buy orders at geometric intervals below current price to accumulate positions during dips. Implements 8% take profit on long positions. Features upward breakout detection (hold position) and downward breakout protection (liquidate and wait). Uses 0.5% grid spacing with 40 levels per side, 5x leverage, and 85% margin utilization. Executes every 5 minutes with comprehensive real-time analytics including volatility metrics, trend analysis, and position tracking.
